title: An Architecture for Deploying Reinforcement Learning in Industrial Environments. (arXiv:2306.01420v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Industry 4.0 is driven by demands like shorter time-to-market, mass customization of products, and batch size one production. Reinforcement Learning (RL), a machine learning paradigm shown to possess a great potential in improving and surpassing human level performance in numerous complex tasks, allows coping with the mentioned demands. In this paper, we present an OPC UA based Operational Technology (OT)-aware RL architecture, which extends the standard RL setting, combining it with the setting of digital twins. Moreover, we define an OPC UA information model allowing for a generalized plug-and-play like approach for exchanging the RL agent used. In conclusion, we demonstrate and evaluate the architecture, by creating a proof of concept. By means of solving a toy example, we show that this architecture can be used to determine the optimal policy using a real control system.

translated_title: 一种用于在工业环境中部署强化学习的架构。
translated_abstract: 工业4.0受到了缩短上市时间、产品批量定制以及批量为一生产等需求的推动。强化学习（RL）是一种机器学习范例，已经在很多复杂任务中显示出具有优于人类的潜力，可以应对上述需求。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于OPC UA的操作技术感知RL架构，它扩展了标准RL设置，并将其与数字孪生的设置相结合。此外，我们还定义了一种OPC UA信息模型，允许采用广义的即插即用方法交换所使用的RL代理。最后，我们通过创建一个概念验证来展示和评估这个架构。通过解决一个玩具例子，我们展示了这个架构可以用于使用实际控制系统确定最优策略。
tldr: 本文提出一种在工业环境中部署强化学习的架构，该架构基于OPC UA，结合数字孪生的设置扩展了标准RL状态，并定义了一种信息模型。我们通过创建概念验证并在控制系统中确定最优策略，验证了该架构的可行性。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an architecture for deploying reinforcement learning in industrial environments, which extends the standard RL setting by combining it with the setting of digital twins and defines an OPC UA information model. The proposed architecture is demonstrated and evaluated through a proof of concept, showing its feasibility in determining the optimal policy using a real control system.
